member.summary: A set of options for configuring the communication mechanisms between the Maki client and server.

member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP URI used for RESTful API calls.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Client.MakiHttpClientOptions.WebsocketUri

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Client.MakiHttpClientOptions.HttpHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets a custom HTTP handler to use when making requests. This only applies to the REST API calls.
